sentences.sentence: Families of Ukrainian prisoners of war face an agonizing wait for information as Russia and Ukraine dispute the facts of the plane crash near their border.

sentences.sentence: Italy prepares to host its Africa Summit, which will try to address the economic hardships that prompt many Africans to migrate to Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As Russia and Ukraine dispute the facts of a plane crash near their border, families

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: of Ukrainian prisoners of war face an agonizing wait for information.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin claims 65 of the 74 people who died were captured soldiers and that the military transport aircraft was shot down by Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The claims have heightened the anxiety of relatives who've been hoping for an imminent prisoner swap. Moscow has not provided any evidence to back up its claims, and Ukraine questions the veracity of a published list of names of prisoners allegedly on board, since Russia's invasion claims by both sides have been difficult to independently verify.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich's pre-trial detention has been extended by a Moscow court until the end of March.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The US citizen is being held on espionage charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Gershkovich is to be kept behind bars until a verdict is reached. The hearing took place behind closed doors in the presence of U.S. Consul General Stuart Wilson. Russian authorities claim details of the criminal case against the journalist are confidential. Gershkovich was arrested in March 2023 during a business trip to the Russian city of Yekaterinburg.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin's Federal Security Service claims the reporter was acting on court instructions from authorities in Washington and collected sensitive information on the Russian military-industrial complex. On the 28th and 29th of January, the Italian government will hold the much-anticipated Africa Summit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over 50 delegations, mainly from African countries as well as EU leaders and representatives of international organizations, will arrive in the Italian capital for the occasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The purpose of the conference is to present Italy's strategic plan that aims to review the country's approach to the African continent. This has been one of the government's priorities since it took office and will be one of the key issues the G7 summit, chaired by Italy, will be focusing on. The plan is estimated to cost around 3 million euros a year and it has a four-year duration. Now its goal is to enhance energy cooperation with African countries and help them in different areas, including health, education and several other sectors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But its main purpose is to address the root economic causes of mass migration from Africa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But some critics have argued that the plan lacks a clear strategy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We asked an expert in the field whether or not the plan will be una strategia clara. Abbiamo chiesto a un esperto nel campo se il plan sarà effettivo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Aspettate. che verranno nel prossimo futuro. Noi speriamo che questo piano venga costruito innanzitutto a partire dai bisogni dell'Africa, degli stati, delle società civili di questi paesi, quindi deve esserci un approccio, come si dice, bottom up, dal basso.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Un aspetto positivo di questo piano Mattei è una visione di lungo periodo, cioè che non ci sia un approccio emergenziale.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Arrivano tot clandestini, tot barconi, allora dobbiamo fare qualcosa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: No, ci deve essere un approccio di lungo periodo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sembra che Roma voglia fare un ruolo più cruciale nella regione mediterranea e il plan sarà sia un test per l'Italia che per l'Europa.

There's been a similar increase in France, with interior ministry figures showing over 1,500 anti-Semitic acts since October, the number for the previous three years combined.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Liverpool coach Jurgen Klopp shocked the world of football

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: after announcing he will leave the club at the end of the season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: During the eight years Klopp spent by Liverpool's side, he brought the club to the summit of European football and ended its 30-year wait for an English league title in 2020. Klopp said about his decision that it was not what he wanted to do, but it's what he thinks is right. Liverpool confirmed Klopp's assistant managers and elite development coach will also leave at the end of the season.
